|1||Healing and magic potions grant a free attack against all adjacent enemies.||Whenever you drink a healing potion, you attack all around you.
|-
| colspan="3" |
The triggering potions are [[potion of curing|curing]], [[potion of heal wounds|heal wounds]], and [[potion of magic|magic]].
|-

'''Species notes:''' [[Oni]] start with this mutation. Exclusive to [[Oni]].
